commentBody:
Couple things. I worked in research @ the U of MN for decades. The data collection methods being used are antiquated! Random digit dial to whom? Who answers their cell phone or regular phone anymore?!? Everyone under the age of 60 screens their calls. Wake up media.

Also, I'm from Minnesota and my daughter & sisters go/went to UW Madison. Yes there is a phenomenon called "Minnesota nice". Probably a "Wisconsin nice" too. However, there are a LOT of highly educated accomplished people here. Look at how many Fortune 500 companies are here; 3M, Target, Medtronic, Ecolab, Delta (hub. Used to be Northwest before merge) Epic, etc. I sincerely hope our vote goes to Rubio. But we are the state that elected Jesse Ventura.
